p: The study area is located in the North China Plain, in eastern China (34°22’to 38°23’north latitude, 114°19’ to 122°43’ east longitude, Fig 1), with a population of more than 99 million and an area of 158,000 km 2. Shandong Province has a large population of agricultural workers and high land cultivation rate in China. The central region is mountainous and hilly, which is surrounded by plains.
